description: Creates a snapshot of a DB cluster.

parameters.name: DBClusterSnapshotIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the DB cluster snapshot. This parameter is stored as a lowercase string. Constraints: Must contain from 1 to 63 letters, numbers, or hyphens. First character must be a letter. Cannot end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens. Example: my-cluster1-snapshot1

parameters.name: DBClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the DB cluster to create a snapshot for. This parameter is not case-sensitive. Constraints: Must match the identifier of an existing DBCluster. Example: my-cluster1

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags to be assigned to the DB cluster snapshot. (dict) --- Metadata assigned to an Amazon Neptune resource consisting of a key-value pair. Key (string) --- A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$'). Value (string) --- A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --/', --=', --+', ---' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-]*)$').

nested_items.name: DBClusterSnapshot
nested_items.description: Contains the details for an Amazon Neptune DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: Provides the list of EC2 Availability Zones that instances in the DB cluster snapshot can be restored in.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: DBClusterSnapshotIdentifier
nested_items.description: Specifies the identifier for a DB cluster snapshot. Must match the identifier of an existing snapshot.

nested_items.name: DBClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: Specifies the DB cluster identifier of the DB cluster that this DB cluster snapshot was created from.

nested_items.name: SnapshotCreateTime
nested_items.description: Provides the time when the snapshot was taken, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: Engine
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the database engine.

nested_items.name: AllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: Specifies the allocated storage size in gibibytes (GiB).

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: Specifies the port that the DB cluster was listening on at the time of the snapshot.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: Provides the VPC ID associated with the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: ClusterCreateTime
nested_items.description: Specifies the time when the DB cluster was created, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: MasterUsername
nested_items.description: Not supported by Neptune.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: Provides the version of the database engine for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: LicenseModel
nested_items.description: Provides the license model information for this DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: SnapshotType
nested_items.description: Provides the type of the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: PercentProgress
nested_items.description: Specifies the percentage of the estimated data that has been transferred.

nested_items.name: StorageEncrypted
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the DB cluster snapshot is encrypted.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: If StorageEncrypted is true, the Amazon KMS key identifier for the encrypted DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: DBClusterSnapshotArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the DB cluster snapshot.

nested_items.name: SourceDBClusterSnapshotArn
nested_items.description: If the DB cluster snapshot was copied from a source DB cluster snapshot, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the source DB cluster snapshot, otherwise, a null value.

nested_items.name: IAMDatabaseAuthenticationEnabled
nested_items.description: True if mapping of Amazon Identity and Access Management (IAM) accounts to database accounts is enabled, and otherwise false.

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: The storage type associated with the DB cluster snapshot.
